title: civil control
description: Anyone who renounces responsibility also renounces the decision
description_hu: Aki lemond a felelősségről, az lemond a döntésről is.
description_full: Politics, just like corporations, have their own perspectives. Politics, just like corporations, should be kept from breaking common sense of humanity, generosity, responsibility — the big words. This webring is a curated list of civil movements who work for similar objectives. “There are only two rules: 1) No one rule shall be self-evident or undisputed. 2) No more rules.”
